title: Textile, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 181.5 x 86.5 cm (5 ft. 11 7/16 in. x 34 1/16 in.)
description: Cupids - flying, holding garlands and wrestling - on an allover background of hearts and arrows in a rosy red. Fabric is a 20th century copy of an ealier design by J.B. Huet for Oberkampf at Jouy.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-364.
